remarks: Functionality of a polarity.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lpolf.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lpolf.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lpolf.p $e |- P = ( LPol ` W ) $.
lpolf.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. X ) $.
lpolf.o $e |- ( ph -> ._|_ e. P ) $.
lpolfN $p |- ( ph -> ._|_ : ~P V --> S ) $.
